Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbonauts!

This is cadet Treldon reporting in from Hungary.

I have been playing KSP for about 1.5 months now.

Can't say I have had huge successes yet - been to Mun once, just finished my first orbital station (have to stockpile some of that precious fuel in LKO before going further)

Oh, I run Stock Career with only a few RP addons like Chatterer, nothing fancy like FAR or NEAR

I have been checking the forums for a while now and found some great advice and good ideas

(As a matter of fact this isn't my first post, somehow missed this section on the first few passes - I did post one of my surface contraptions on the Exchange, but it seems nobody wanted to comment on it yet )

That's all for now. Any and all suggestions and advices are welcome!

Cheers
Hello Treldon. Welcome to the community.
